name: Cobrenha - Snake game 3D
description:
The classic snake game with a new face, face a new challenge every second and overcome yourself, in this game your level goes up every time you reach the objective and eat the crystal.

The game is great to pass the time in a queue or to relax, beat your previous high score and show your friend who is the best.

 And soon more news will come to the game. Thanks for playing :)
